programme.title: Gran Premio Red Bull de España Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The Spanish motorcycle Grand Prix is a motorcycling event that is part of the FIM Grand Prix motorcycle racing season that takes place at Circuito de Jerez-Ángel Nieto outside Jerez de la Frontera in Andalucia. In addition to this event, three other World Championship motorcycling events take place in Spain as of the 2019 season: the Catalan motorcycle Grand Prix, the Aragon motorcycle Grand Prix and the Valencian Community motorcycle Grand Prix, in the autonomous communities of Catalonia, Aragon and Valencia respectively. Circuito de Jerez-Ángel Nieto is due to host three Grands Prix in 2022, 2023 and 2025.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.(n)

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Main Event - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.(n)

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3

programme.title: UFC Main Event
programme.desc: Ep.908: Adesanya vs Whittaker 2 - Middleweight champion Israel “The Last Stylebender” Adesanya comes face to face with the man he defeated to earn the 185-pound belt, Robert “The Reaper” Whittaker”. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their rematch at UFC 271.(n)

programme.title: UFC Reloaded
programme.desc: Ep.UFC 281: Adesanya vs Pereira - Two titles were on the line at UFC 281 as middleweight champion Israel Adesanya faced former foe Alex Pereira. Plus, Carla Esparza had her first title defense against former champion Zhang Weili. See the entire main card, and more, of UFC Reloaded.(n)

programme.title: UFC Main Event
programme.desc: Ep.903: Volkanovski vs Ortega - Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian “T-City” Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFC’s 145-pound title.(n)

programme.title: UFC Reloaded
programme.desc: Ep.UFC 270:Ngannou vs Gane - UFC 270 featured a heavyweight bout between reigning champion Francis Ngannou and interim champion Cyril Gane. Also, Brandon Moreno and Deivesion Figueiredo threw down for a third time for flyweight gold. See the main card on UFC Reloaded.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili
programme.desc: Prelims - A relentless force meets an immovable tank on March 11 when former bantamweight champion Petr “No Mercy” Yan faces Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili in a highly anticipatedUFC Fight Night main event at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. On the road to regaining his 135-pound crown, Yan’s resume includes knockouts of Urijah Faber and Jose Aldo, and he plans on adding Dvalishvili’s name to that list, but with eight consecutive wins and an aggressive attack that has seen him defeat Aldo, Marlon Moraes and Cody Stamann, “The Machine” is no one’s stepping stone.(n)

programme.title: Gran Premio Red Bull de España Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The Spanish motorcycle Grand Prix is a motorcycling event that is part of the FIM Grand Prix motorcycle racing season that takes place at Circuito de Jerez-Ángel Nieto outside Jerez de la Frontera in Andalucia. In addition to this event, three other World Championship motorcycling events take place in Spain as of the 2019 season: the Catalan motorcycle Grand Prix, the Aragon motorcycle Grand Prix and the Valencian Community motorcycle Grand Prix, in the autonomous communities of Catalonia, Aragon and Valencia respectively. Circuito de Jerez-Ángel Nieto is due to host three Grands Prix in 2022, 2023 and 2025.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili
programme.desc: Prelims - A relentless force meets an immovable tank on March 11 when former bantamweight champion Petr “No Mercy” Yan faces Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili in a highly anticipatedUFC Fight Night main event at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. On the road to regaining his 135-pound crown, Yan’s resume includes knockouts of Urijah Faber and Jose Aldo, and he plans on adding Dvalishvili’s name to that list, but with eight consecutive wins and an aggressive attack that has seen him defeat Aldo, Marlon Moraes and Cody Stamann, “The Machine” is no one’s stepping stone.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili
programme.desc: Main Event - A relentless force meets an immovable tank on March 11 when former bantamweight champion Petr “No Mercy” Yan faces Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili in a highly anticipatedUFC Fight Night main event at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. On the road to regaining his 135-pound crown, Yan’s resume includes knockouts of Urijah Faber and Jose Aldo, and he plans on adding Dvalishvili’s name to that list, but with eight consecutive wins and an aggressive attack that has seen him defeat Aldo, Marlon Moraes and Cody Stamann, “The Machine” is no one’s stepping stone.(n)

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.(n)

programme.title: Cherating Syndrome
programme.desc: After a confusing breakup, Alisha decides to go on a trip to Cherating to figure out whether her relationship is worth fighting for. There, she meets a local stranger who offers her a tour around Cherating which changes her perspective on life.(n)

programme.title: Kids Run
programme.desc: Andi is a former boxer who now struggles as a day labourer. When he loses his job suddenly, he finds himself threatened with the loss of custody of his beloved three children. An amateur boxing competition with a huge prize money becomes his only hope.(n)

programme.title: Unrelated
programme.desc: Starring Tom Hiddleston (Thor) and newcomer Kathryn Worth, Unrelated is a terse and gripping psychodrama that focuses on a childless Anna who’s dissatisfied with her marriage. She soon falls for another man but her demons soon return to haunt her.(n)

programme.title: One Floor Below
programme.desc: After being the sole unfortunate witness to a domestic quarrel that ends up in a murder, Patrascu finds himself at odds with two very close neighbours: one is the bizarre murderer. The other is his very own conscience.(n)

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.(n)

programme.title: Rust
programme.desc: After connecting with each other on social media, Tati and Renet’s budding relationship is cut short when Tati’s intimate video is leaked online. While Renet has to deal with problems with his parents, Tati is struggling to keep her life from crumbling.(n)

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.(n)

programme.title: Cherating Syndrome
programme.desc: After a confusing breakup, Alisha decides to go on a trip to Cherating to figure out whether her relationship is worth fighting for. There, she meets a local stranger who offers her a tour around Cherating which changes her perspective on life.(n)

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night

programme.title: On The Edge
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Raevskiy is a successful but arrogant film director. He has money, women, and fame. However, when a family tragedy occurs, his world comes crashing. Alone and helpless, he embarks on a journey of self-destruction and reflection.(n)

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.(n)

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Married couple, Luca and Susi, are facing problems at work and they struggle to support their family of four. When Mary, their new au pair arrives, her presence lights up the dull household and her beauty captivates the lovestruck Luca and his son.(n)

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.(n)

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid
programme.desc: Two detectives investigate the death of a mermaid, Sybille Baumgartner, who was found beaten to death on the shore of Lake Constance. They suspect the killer was Matteo, a kite-surfer who left the crime scene with a knife in his abdomen.(n)

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.(n)

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.(n)

programme.title: Cardboard House
programme.desc: Homelessness in Singapore is easy to miss. But once the lights are dimmed and the bustle quietens, they live in plain sight. From family problems to financial issues, the pains of the homeless are complex – but that shouldn’t stop us from seeing them.(n)

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.(n)

programme.title: Men In the City
programme.desc: A Berlin gym is the stage for five men to play out their testosterone-filled pursuits of casual sex, camaraderie and contoured bodies. As they stumble from one misadventure to another, including wrestling a crocodile, they learn the meaning of true love.(n)

programme.title: The Lottery Seer
programme.desc: As one of the few literate people in his Indonesian village in the 1980s, 5 year old Herman aspires to be a famous reader. However, his rare ability in the village leaves him open to exploitation.(n)

programme.title: Cardboard House
programme.desc: Homelessness in Singapore is easy to miss. But once the lights are dimmed and the bustle quietens, they live in plain sight. From family problems to financial issues, the pains of the homeless are complex – but that shouldn’t stop us from seeing them.(n)

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 2
programme.desc: After getting bitten by a snake and waking up in a remote village in Vietnam, Paula sets off on her quest to find her twin sister and the doctor who had treated her. However, she soon learns of her sister’s dark secret.(n)

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.(n)

programme.title: Real Guys
programme.desc: After a failed modelling stint, Jonas returns home penniless and to a son who doesn’t recognise him. When he’s offered the job to be a stripper, the fast cash attracts him. But how will he hide this embarrassing secret from his son and new love interest?(n)

programme.title: The Violin Teacher
programme.desc: Laerte, a talented violinist, is forced to teach in a public school in a Brazilian slum after failing to get into the renowned São Paulo Symphonic Orchestra. Laerte grows closer to his students but has to make a difficult choice between them and his dream.(n)

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.(n)

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Deadly Turquoise
programme.desc: When the corpse of a famous art expert was discovered in the dunes, Sievers and Ina are tasked to pursue any possible leads. However, findings of turquoise-coloured particles on the corpse point to the investigation of a long-lost painting.(n)

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.(n)

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 2
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet Özakinb narrowly survives a bomb blast in a café thanks to the intervention of his colleague Mustafa. With two key figures in the current case dead from the blast, and the official narrative not adding up, Mehmet suspects foul play.(n)

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.(n)

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Curse From The Deep
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Florian Friedrich recovers a hoard of old coins from the bottom of Lake Constance, but is later found dead with his mouth sewn up with a gold coin inside. Two detectives are called to investigate the mysterious death.(n)

programme.title: Real Guys
programme.desc: After a failed modelling stint, Jonas returns home penniless and to a son who doesn’t recognise him. When he’s offered the job to be a stripper, the fast cash attracts him. But how will he hide this embarrassing secret from his son and new love interest?(n)

programme.title: Let Me Go
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Helga Schenider’s mother joined the Nazi SS in 1941 and abandoned her little daughter. In 2000, Helga’s family located her in a nursing home but the trauma and scars of the cruel past return to haunt the three generations of women.(n)

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.(n)

programme.title: In-Laws In The Outback
programme.desc: The Kowlaskis and the Von Zagenheim’s marriages are on the verge of a breakdown when their children decide to get married. They travel to the South African bush for the wedding but lose their way en-route and stumble into an illegal diamond mine.(n)

programme.title: The Violin Teacher
programme.desc: Laerte, a talented violinist, is forced to teach in a public school in a Brazilian slum after failing to get into the renowned São Paulo Symphonic Orchestra. Laerte grows closer to his students but has to make a difficult choice between them and his dream.(n)

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Married couple, Luca and Susi, are facing problems at work and they struggle to support their family of four. When Mary, their new au pair arrives, her presence lights up the dull household and her beauty captivates the lovestruck Luca and his son.(n)

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.(n)

programme.title: Murders in Lille
programme.desc: A sculptor is found dead inside one of his own sculptures on exhibition. Detective Caroline works with a childhood friend, who is also the exhibition’s designer, to crack the case. But little does she know, the suspect is closer than she’ll ever imagine.(n)

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.(n)

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Curse From The Deep
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Florian Friedrich recovers a hoard of old coins from the bottom of Lake Constance, but is later found dead with his mouth sewn up with a gold coin inside. Two detectives are called to investigate the mysterious death.(n)

programme.title: Let Me Go
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Helga Schenider’s mother joined the Nazi SS in 1941 and abandoned her little daughter. In 2000, Helga’s family located her in a nursing home but the trauma and scars of the cruel past return to haunt the three generations of women.(n)

programme.title: In-Laws In The Outback
programme.desc: The Kowlaskis and the Von Zagenheim’s marriages are on the verge of a breakdown when their children decide to get married. They travel to the South African bush for the wedding but lose their way en-route and stumble into an illegal diamond mine.(n)

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Married couple, Luca and Susi, are facing problems at work and they struggle to support their family of four. When Mary, their new au pair arrives, her presence lights up the dull household and her beauty captivates the lovestruck Luca and his son.(n)

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga
programme.desc: Di Sebelah Ada Surga menceritakan tentang 3 pemuda iaitu Andika, Gading, dan Uus. Kehidupan rohaniah mereka dikatakan masih kurang. Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.(n)

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga
programme.desc: Di Sebelah Ada Surga menceritakan tentang 3 pemuda iaitu Andika, Gading, dan Uus. Kehidupan rohaniah mereka dikatakan masih kurang. Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.(n)

programme.title: Dewi Rindu
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.(n)

programme.title: Mas Driver Kasih Hati Tanpa Berpamitan Aku Rela
programme.desc: Terperangkap dalam cinta lama dengan Mila membuatkan Erik terfikir apa sebenarnya yang berlaku antara mereka. Dia menyangka ibu bapa Mila tidak merestui hubungan mereka. Namun, dia sedar ada lebih daripada itu.(n)

programme.title: Gembira Waktu Siang
programme.desc: Gembira Waktu Siang (disingkat GWS) merupakan sebuah rancangan hiburan yang berkongsi kegembiraan menerusi beberapa segmen yang segar dan unik. Program ini dihoskan oleh Raffi Ahmad, Vega Darwanti, Prinsa Mandagie, Mandala Shoji, dan Jirayut.(n)

programme.title: Barakallah
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga.(n)

programme.title: Pop Academy
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars\.(n)

programme.title: Mas Driver Kasih Hati Tanpa Berpamitan Aku Rela

programme.title: Kalau Laundry Cinta Dikasih Info Mazseh
programme.desc: Sky meminati Mira tetapi terpaksa berbohong kepadanya tentang latar belakangnya. Dia tidak mahu Mira tahu ayahnya mahu merobohkan rumahnya untuk projek. Mira dan ibunya kecewa dengan Sky apabila mengetahui perkara itu. Sky tidak berputus asa. Dengan kegigihannya, dia berjaya mengejar Mira demi cintanya.(n)

programme.title: Ikhtiar Ibu Yang Berkorban Untuk Kedua Buah Hatinya
programme.desc: Netta seorang anak yang berbakti, sentiasa menemani ibunya apabila ada panggilan untuk perkhidmatan urut. Ardi pula selalu menyusahkan ibunya.(n)

programme.title: Cinta Misteri
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.(n)

Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.(n)

programme.title: Barakallah
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga.(n)

programme.title: Jodoh Bambang Anti Nyasar
programme.desc: Apakah yang akan berlaku sekiranya pemandu teksi terpaksa menjadi pengantin pengganti kepada penumpangnya?(n)

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.(n)

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2020
programme.desc: Kemegahan panggung Indosiar dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia meskipun di tengah pandemik. Dianjurkan oleh hos terkenal Indonesia dan persembahan menakjubkan oleh pelbagai artis dan penyanyi.(n)

programme.title: Cinta Misteri
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.(n)

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.(n)

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan

programme.title: Bukan Salah Cinta
programme.desc: Danang tidak dapat menafikan perasaannya terhadap Saras. Sebenarnya cinta itu tidak salah, tetapi yang salah ialah status mereka yang bergelar guru dan pelajar. Mampukah Danang jatuh cinta dengan Saras yang sebenarnya gurunya sendiri?(n)

programme.title: Perjuangan Bocah Penjual Cobek Yang Ingin Bertemu Tuhan
programme.desc: Ibu bapa Farel meninggal dunia ketika dalam perjalanan untuk menjemputnya dari sekolah. Kegembiraan Farel memenangi trofi itu serta-merta bertukar menjadi kesedihan yang mendalam. Sejak itu, dia diamanahkan kepada bapa saudaranya. Namun, isteri bapa saudaranya tidak sanggup menjaga Farel secara percuma. Oleh itu, dia disuruh menjual mortar untuk mendapatkan wang.(n)

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.(n)

programme.title: Ujian Kesabaran Ibu Penjual Angkringan Di Bulan Yang Penuh Ampunan
programme.desc: Mak Lela kini tinggal bersama anaknya, Lukman dan keluarga selepas pengsan di gerai kereta sorongnya. Isteri Luqman, Santi dan anak perempuan, Nada berasa kurang senang dengan kehadiran dan nasihat Mak Leha. Mereka akan menyeksa Mak Leha apabila Luqman tiada di rumah.(n)

programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.(n)

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.(n)

programme.title: Barakallah
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga.(n)

programme.title: Ujian Kesabaran Ibu Penjual Angkringan Di Bulan Yang Penuh Ampunan
programme.desc: Mak Lela kini tinggal bersama anaknya, Lukman dan keluarga selepas pengsan di gerai kereta sorongnya. Isteri Luqman, Santi dan anak perempuan, Nada berasa kurang senang dengan kehadiran dan nasihat Mak Leha. Mereka akan menyeksa Mak Leha apabila Luqman tiada di rumah.(n)

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.(n)

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2020
programme.desc: Kemegahan panggung Indosiar dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia meskipun di tengah pandemik. Dianjurkan oleh hos terkenal Indonesia dan persembahan menakjubkan oleh pelbagai artis dan penyanyi.(n)

programme.title: Cinta Misteri
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.(n)

programme.desc: Natasha and Gael - Using virtual reality, architects Damion Burrows and Lizzie Fraher compete to remodel a home in Leigh-on-Sea. Will the finished build live up to the hopes of a family who love to host?(n)

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders (S1)
programme.desc: Jamie cooks super-speedy smoked salmon pasta, a loaded beef burger with sweet red peppers, pickles and mustard, and gorgeously soft and sticky toffee apple buns.(n)

programme.desc: Jamie cooks a tasty aubergine burger, the quickest sesame-seared salmon supper, and chickpea and squash casserole that you can turn into a whole host of delicious dishes.(n)

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out (S1)
programme.desc: Emotions run high as Stacey Solomon and her team help single Mum Steph and her three daughters transform their home through a life changing declutter and budget friendly makeover.(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: Melbourne (S1)
programme.desc: Immigration has played a massive role in shaping the food scene of Melbourne. Rachel explores Melbourne's melting pot of authentic cuisines, wandering through the authentic Vietnamese areas, tracking down the popular suburban hot bed of all things Greek and learns how to create the famous tomato based Passata from an Italian Nona.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2)
programme.desc: In the final episode, Rick visits the Rame Peninsula. Far from the traditional tourist track, this part of Cornwall is famed for its cliffs and beaches. Rick also meets a beachcomber who has found some remarkable objects washed up on the shore. In mining country, Rick explores the history of the Cornish pasty and shows us how to cook them the proper Cornish way.(n)

programme.title: Hungry For It (S1)
programme.desc: The top six cooks level up tinned food into spectacular brunches and create pasta mash-ups to impress a top food influencer.(n)

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S3)
programme.desc: The five remaining teams in this heat make layered vegetable cake slices and tomato shaped desserts, before creating an allotment-themed pièce montée made from 160 choux buns.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S8)
programme.desc: It's summer week and the sewers make light and airy outfits, including a summer dress, a creation from old hammocks and a two-piece trouser co-ord for a man or a woman.(n)
